dct_title_s: Orbis terrarum typus de integro multis in locis emendatus
dct_description_sm: Engraved by Jan van Doetecam. Double hemispherical map of the world, with 2 smaller celestial hemispheres. New Guinea shown as part of southern continent called Magallanica.The two hemispheres are surrounded by representations of Europa, Asia, Mexicana, Peruana, Africa, and Magallanica.
